title: Lea Gottlieb & Gottex Swimwear, an interview with Keren Ben-Horin
itunes:title: Lea Gottlieb & Gottex Swimwear, an interview with Keren Ben-Horin
description:
This week we meet Israeli swimwear designer and innovater Lea Gottlieb (1918-2012), the visionary founder of the luxury swimwear brand Gottex. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
